comment.author: 25512944@N06
comment._content: Heading north. Appears to be northern suburbs of Wollongong, but the single line (as far as I can make out) suggests south towards Kiama.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: That is quite possibly the bridge right in downtown Kiama.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/25512944@N06] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] Thanks, now we just need to find a modern day view of this Kiama bridge to compare.

AB

comment.author: 25512944@N06
comment._content: Terralong St Kiama was my first thought, and I spent quite a bit of time on Streetview before my initial comment. I discounted it on the basis that there was no station in view and the grade of the road is too steep, and the police station is not in view under the bridge. The bridge does seem familiar though, but I can't find any pictures of the old bridge online.

comment.author: 25512944@N06
comment._content: Aaah, just checked Wollongong Library collection - the Terralong St bridge has been steel since the 1890s, with a wider span as the harbour tramway ran under it at the northern side of the road see illawarraimages.wollongong.nsw.gov.au/IllaIms/P07/P07391.jpg

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/25512944@N06] That's great, by a process of elimination we might find the right bridge!

AB

comment.author: 69885822@N04
comment._content: The bridge appears to be the one over Shoalhaven Street about 50 metres north of the Terralong (aka old Princess Highway) Bridge in Kiama.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
I just had a look at the railway bridge over Shoalhaven Street, Kiama on google street view. It looks like a good candidate. Todays version is all concrete of course but the surrounds look like a good match!
- AG

comment.author: 25512944@N06
comment._content: I think Shoalhaven St is going to be the closest we get - from Streetview it seems like a very good match.

comment.author: 64674298@N04
comment._content: Deffinately Shoalhaven Street with No.2 Down Home Signal in view. Since replaced with concrete bridge.
